description:
Demolition of existing buildings and redevelopment of site to provide new leisure centre (Class E(d)) and medical centre (Class E(e)) building with rooftop pitches, 198 flats (Class C3)  in three blocks of seven, eight and twenty storeys, public realm improvements and associated landscaping works.
DEPARTURE FROM POLICY: Erection of a tall building on an unallocated site, and omission of nursery and energy centre as prescribed by Site Allocation.

open_spaces_details.description: Please see the Open Space Assessment for full details on changes to open space provision.
